definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Cain, Kain eldest son of Adam and Eve (expl. Ge 4:1 fr. [[קָנׇה]] acquire; but in fact = II. ´[[ק]]:, as heros eponymos, acc. to We:Comp.11 Sta:G 285 ff. Bu:Urg. 193 Holz:Ge 50 f. esp. Sta:ZAW xiv (1894), 250 ff.; xv (1895), 157 ff., Che:Ency.Bib.CAIN);—´[[ק]]: Ge 4:1, Ge 4:2, Ge 4:3, Ge 4:5, Ge 4:5, Ge 4:8, Ge 4:8, Ge 4:9, Ge 4:13, Ge 4:15, Ge 4:15, Ge 4:16, Ge 4:17, [[קָָיִן]] v:Ge 4:6, v:Ge 4:24, v:Ge 4:25 (all J).
